Discovered repositories from the open source frontier

View the Project on GitHub

SparcLab/OpenSERDES

OpenSERDES is an open-source digital Serializer/Deserializer using Skywater 130nm PDK for converting parallel data to high-speed serial data and back

View on index

Related repos

  • JSON and binary serialization for C++ objects, with simple interfaces for reading and writing data
  • Google’s data serialization format for structured data
  • Zero-encoding binary serializer for C# and Unity
  • data streaming platform for backend devs, quick setup, real-time features, schema management
  • Fast Postgres data streaming with CDC
  • run local LLMs fast on consumer GPUs with flexible quantization
  • Python framework for stateful stream processing
  • Generates synthetic data from models in a DSL
  • Tool for creating, editing, and exporting fine-tuning datasets for LLMs with document processing and multiple export formats
  • data preparation and training system for parsing, generating, and evaluating high-quality data from noisy sources
